titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "Helen Keller Deaf-Blind Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
6/23/2014--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Helen Keller Deaf-Blind Awareness Week.
Recognizes and honors people who are deaf-blind and organizations, such as the Helen Keller National Center, that continue to promote the awareness and needs of the deaf-blind community.
